titleStmt.title: A true relation of a late victory obtained by Major Generall Brown his forces about Clifton within three miles of Abington, against a partie of Wallingford. Wherein the governour of Wallingford was taken prisoner, with 60 horse and more, divers other prisoners: one major, six captains, divers lieutenants, cornets, ensignes, some in present command, others reformadoes, &c. The particulars whereof being sent in a letter from Doctor Wilson to a friend here in London, and now printed and published. Published according to order.
titleStmt.author: Wilson, Edmund, of Abingdon.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Matth. Simmons for Henry Overton in Popes-head Alley.,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan 22th 1645"; the second 6 in imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
